entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: allow making attributes suppress warnings with `(Unconditional)SuppressMessage` #68301
  • [API Proposal]: IsPlusAddress property for MailAddress #68296
  • System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes fail on OSX #68293
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo failing in CI #68291
  • LongContinuationChain_Unwrap_DoesNotStackOverflow long running test #68290
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests long running tests #68289
  • System.Text.Json is unable to deserialize FluentValidation.Results.ValidationResult #68280
  • [devloop] Debug build linker errors in tests on Unix #68279
  • NativeAOT: Failed to compile a WinUI app #68278
  • GlobalizationNative_LoadICUData never called when using Invariant mode (Mac Catalyst and other Apple platforms) #68277
    7.0.0
  • Cannot build runtime on s390x: The "ApiCompatTask" task failed unexpectedly. #68266
    7.0.0
  • BinaryData.Empty.ToString throws ArgumentNullException #68262
  • C++ cli reference .net 5/6 which reference .net standard2+ not working on Windows #68261
  • System.Diagnostics.Process with CreateNoWindow does not redirect stdout/stderr to parent process #68259
  • blazor wasm List<(string Key, string Value)> from server to client values lost #68264
  • How to build a project using locally built ILCompiler? #68257
  • UTF8 pointer + nuint overloads #68256
  • NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged Event does not fire on tunnel interface change on OSX #68255
  • [API Proposal]: Move APIs for generated marshalling to different namespace - System.Runtime.Marshalling #68248
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_NotepadWithContent_withArgumentList(useShellExecute: True) #68246
  • Analyzer: Detect the problem of using a System.Type overload instead of the generic overload #68243

Closed

  • Test failure System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollectorTests.TestHandleCollector #66571
  • JsonSerializer support for JsonDocument types in source generation mode #59954
    7.0.0
  • Consider using RegexCasingEquivalence table for case insensitive matches when the pattern contains backreferences #67624
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessModuleTests.ModulesAreDisposedWhenProcessIsDisposed test is failing #68035
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexKnownPatternTests.Docs_Examples_ValidateEmail failure #68286
  • "The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: RevocationStatusUnknown" in XHarness tasks #68298
    7.0.0
  • Text.Json – Deserialization of object does not convert empty or whitespace string to null #68263
  • System.Text.Json changes the data datatype from double to int on serialization #68267
  • Windows arm64 Tests failing on DDARM64-132 #67821
  • "A local file header is corrupt" error occurs while unpacking the ZIP archive #49580
    Future
  • Support for Unicode Case Folding from SpecialCasing.txt #68287
    Future
  • [tracking]: Reversion of `!!` rollout #68284
  • JsonObject Unable to find a default constructor to use for type #66808
  • [NativeAOT] Benchmarks using Vector<T> seems to be slow #68222
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 7 #64599
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!foundMismatch' during 'LSRA allocate' #66580
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'inVarToRegMap[varIndex] == REG_STK' during 'LSRA allocate' #66579
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Inserting upper vector restore in block having BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #64550
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT publish regression in preview version (worked with alpha) hangs and uses 20GB+ memory #68079
  • Failed to download package DotNetHostPolicy when building in x86 during restore #68152
    7.0.0
  • The mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.11601 is missing from symbol servers. #68163
  • Dereferencing a pointer to a byte-sized structure reads a DWORD #68157
    7.0.0
  • JIT uses too wide reads for small returned structs #58874
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Missing sign extension for `bswap16` #67723
    7.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #68148
    7.0.0
  • COMPlus_EnableSSE3=0 does not set Ssse3.IsSupported to false #68245
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking isn't always matching semantics of backtracking engines #65607
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/21/2022 9:08:44 PM #64275
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/10/2021 8:28:32 PM #63457
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_Timeout_Loop_Throws(engine: Compiled) #61710
  • Match_Timeout_Loop_Throws test is not timing out with RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #60623
    7.0.0
  • Strings.resx is embedded twice into the assembly for projects that set EnableDefaultItems to true #68218
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests test library crashing in CI with dump available #68037
    7.0.0
  • Linux x64 release SourceBuild build break in CI #67474
  • Json SourceGen tests are not running on .NET Framework #63463
    7.0.0
  • tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror failing in local coreclr test run #56633
    7.0.0
  • Methodical_do, Methodical_others, Methodical_ro work items failing in CI #68254
  • Hang while waiting for runtime to suspend thread in busy loop #67559
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #67912
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #66768
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests. #66342
  • PushRange empty Array throws exception #68228
  • Inconsistency in root .editorconfig with published coding style. #68238
  • Add concurrency data structures for TPL #40029
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not reset assigned interval twice #68305
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Windows and Ubuntu perf runs on Ampere hw #68304
  • Added Fixes for LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests and Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #68303
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • link coreclrpal static library into tests that use pal.h #68299
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use file-scoped namespaces in API proposal template #68295
    community-contribution
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-asmdiffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • If the user has < 65 cores and passes in an affinitized range for the 0th CPU group, if valid, honor it. #68283
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add more diagnostics to LookupProperty (more diagnostics to flaky tests) #68281
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Don't build non shared framework refs in ref build #68275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix incorrect definition of LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD in System.DirectoryServices #68274
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Added `TestEventListener` #68273
  • Add a test for ECDSA signatures at zero #68271
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Enable new CA1311 (ToLower/Upper culture) and CA1852 (seal internal/private types) rules #68268
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68265
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Do not use '.NET Core' anymore in error messages #68260
    area-Host
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing #68258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Pass more information about execution mode to RegexRunners #68242
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • [MAUI][Blazor][PERF] Add IPA file usage for iOS/MacCatalyst Maui Blaz… #68300
  • Update TestHandleCollector() test #68285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Add API entry for JsonDocument converter #60236
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove dead const from RegexNode #68297
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add retries to ModulesAreDisposedWhenProcessIsDisposed #68104
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Fix Docs_Examples_ValidateEmail test #68294
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Only set the assembly binder on success when binding to SPCL #68282
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Sum/Average #68226
    area-System.Linq
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Min/Max #68183
    area-System.Linq
  • fix the srcBufferLength check #68270
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added fixes for tests which are not robust against line endings #68231
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68235
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use and support OpenSSL 3 on macOS #68045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix handling of vector instruction sets in NativeAOT compiler #68249
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean-up `System.Drawing.Common` and remove the Unix code. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Add missing RUC annotation to IAsyncEnumerableConverterFactory #68233
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Remove CallArgABIInfo::ArgNum and fill out function headers #68209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exposing ExpM1, Exp2, Exp2M1, Exp10, Exp10M1, LogP1, Log2P1, and Log10P1 #68251
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark OperatingSystem.IsXXX properties as non-versionable #68250
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add LibraryImportGenerator to ref pack #68247
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Delete libkrb5-dev from NativeAOT prereqs #68253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete legacy HRESULTs and error messages #68252
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Avoid duplicate Strings.resx import & code-cleanup #68220
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Rename .md files that are not actually markdown #68239
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept behavior for an empty set of values #68244
    area-System.Memory
  • Overhaul when/where we check for Regex timeouts #68146
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Remove platform dependent compilation of System.Private.Uri #68011
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Update 'main' branding to release/7.0-preview5 #68236
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Retype pointers to 'this' on stack as unmanaged pointers #68074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude all markdown files from triggering CI #68221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exposing MaxMagnitudeNumber, MaxNumber, MinMagnitudeNumber, and MinNumber #68217
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #68119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [MAUI][Blazor][PERF] Add Android/iOS/MacCatalyst Maui Blazor Perf Collection #68241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid stress log shutdown race condition #64722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 and x86 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wip] Run tests on more Android versions #64341
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Vectorized MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #68210
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, no-recent-activity, 7.0.0
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ECDiffieHellmanCng derivekey methods fail if the private key isn't a MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider key #24945
  • Ubuntu 21.10 `dotnet` installed from snap segmentation fault #24944
  • PackageValidation with --no-build when project has ProjectReference causes NETSDK1085 #24943

Closed

  • Dotnet test `--blame-hang-dump-type` does not seem to have effect. #15555

PullRequests

Created

  • update exception message #24973
    Area-Workloads
  • Allow file changes from tar as it's just a warning #24971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the wasm install to skip manifest updates #24958
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935

Merged

  • Expand the system.private.uri coverage to the .net core builds and ad… #24968
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Branding #24934
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24929
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24941
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch updates to include for the targeted package references #24922
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24917
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a fabricbot.json file to auto close issues with "Area-NuGet" label #24589
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline Rename breaks when deleting portion of identifier #60869
  • New Inline Rename UI should maintain the selection from the editor #60868
    17.3
  • Code CleanUp - Remove unnecessary Using - removes usings from files not in loaded projects/solution #60867
  • Ensure that exact number of arguments are given for diagnostic message #60862
  • IDE0046: 'if' statement can be simplified #60859
  • Delay before codefix can be invoked #60857

Closed

  • Source generator diagnostics are not showing up in VS Quick Info #58435
  • Report exceptions thrown by generators in Error List as warnings #54098
    17.3
  • SourceGenerator diagnostics not appearing in error list #49664
    17.3
  • TestPreviewDiagnosticTaggerInPreviewPane is flaky #60863
  • ESLint style single line ignore and lightbulb improvements #60668
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly return E_NOTIMPL when asked for file code models for non-source #60870
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup global notification code more. #60866
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused method `Binder.CheckViability<TSymbol>()` #60865
    Area-Compilers
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup brace completion code. #60854
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo in Stack Trace Explorer text #60853
    Area-IDE
  • Fix infinite loop introduced with https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/60227 #60852
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Revert diasymreader version update due to cloudbuild failures #60861
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Cherry-pick 60493 to 17.2 #60832
    Area-IDE
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure idle-processing (like solution syncing) does not execute while paused due to global operations (like msbuild compiles) #60845
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string (#60227)" #60851
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Assume buffer is visible if we can't find any views for it at all #60856
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge 'main' into 'DefaultInterfaceImplementation' #60850
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove deprecated NuPkg projects #60839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix the color key for rename hint text at the bottom #60847
    Area-IDE, auto-merge
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream doesn't support 0-byte reads #41287
    7.0-preview5
  • Doc misinformation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41284
    Backlog
  • Blazor WebAssembly: conflict between parameters and event callback prevents rendering #41282
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41281
    7.0-preview5
  • WebSockets: Authentication of the HTTPS connection timed out #41280
  • Razor Class Library isn't adding typescript output to static web assets #41279
  • When publishing a web application in library mode, it does not copy the contents of _content #41278
  • Update spa templates to facilitate multi-stage docker builds #41275
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Cannot obtain windows account in blazor server using smart card authentication #41285
  • [Discussion] Blazor components are type activated by default #40405
    Discussions
  • StateHasChanged doesn't update input value #41274
  • Razor Page – CSS Isolate not working on body element #41273
  • Order KestrelTrace by event ID #41143
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Use MIT license for Installer EULA #41286
    area-infrastructure
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41283
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr
  • Add linefeed terminator support #41269
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41240
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Check in launchesttings.json from AzureAd.Website #41267
    area-security, 7.0-preview5
  • Improve abort handling #41263
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Split KestrelTrace into multiple files #41245
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Update branding to preview5 #41268
    7.0-preview5

Updated

  • fix allocation issue caused by ordering of MVC result executors for Task results #41108
    area-mvc
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Add MapGroup #41265
    area-web-frameworks
  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

  • Using COMPlus_PerfMapEnabled=1 in production #2155

  • [Feature Request] Distributed Tracing doc improvements #2095

    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create EventPipeFormat.md #3024

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switches are unreliable #6346
  • There should be parse error when setting invalid value to FlowDirection property #6343
  • Consolidate screen size/density APIs #6340
    .NET 7
  • Latest update broke build on all working maui/ blazor solutions #6336
  • Essentials support for net6.0-macos #6333
  • Shell on iOS: completly black screen with .svg files in xaml #6332
  • Shell on iOS: icons are not scaled #6331
  • Shell on Windows: Icons not shown #6330
  • Shell on Windows: Navigation not working #6329
  • CarouselView Position property not updating after changing ItemsSource #6328
  • FlexLayout property values don't have intellisense #6325
  • Drag drop gestures seemingly randomly gets eaten on Windows desktop when dragging outside application #6321
  • .NET MAUI RC1 - CollectionView extremely slow #6317
  • Slider Minimum crashes the app #6305
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MenuBarItems are not rendered if Title is not set #6303
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • SearchHandler does not display more than one suggestion #6293
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Entry and Switch in a Grid #6292
    6.0.300-servicing
  • The Name property of a focusable element must not be null. #6290
    6.0.300
  • Clipping is still not working #6260
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • iOS Background (Remote) Notification Functionality Absent (Since Preview 12) #6259
    6.0.300-rc.3

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid Dev Tools Console Logging #6110
    .NET 7
  • SwipeItems.CollectionChanged event sends wrong sender object #6291
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Evaluate use of string comparisons inside Maui.Core #3085
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • When adding Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Base nuget package can't build the MAUI project #4276
    6.0.300

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can I get a deleted owned entity from the parent entity? #27848
  • Allow Use of InMemoryDatabase for Context with Temporal Tables in .net 6 #27847
  • Migration EF6 to EF Core -> Client-Eval of Top-level projection LINQ #27846
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #27844

Closed

  • HasConversion Fails for Property of OwnedEntity #27788
  • The dotnet dbcontext Scaffold ef and scaffold-dbcontext command does not find the package #27829
  • I expected client evaluation exception using a expression property in my select #27841

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset read count on RelationalDataReader #27845

Merged

  • Update branding to preview5 #27843

Updated

  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response
